Plot: Released from prison, Joe (Billy Bob Thornton) returns to his Ozark Mountain home 16-years after a deadly car accident which took their son's life and injured his wife Chrystal (Lisa Blount). Joe won't go back to his old way of life and gets into trouble with rivals who believe Joe is cutting them out of the business when he's really only seeking personal redemption.
